content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: red_bed
inventory=[{"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 14, "index": 38}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a red_bed, I first need to craft red_dye. To craft red_dye I need to place a beetroot in the crafting grid. I will move the beetroot from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_bed
inventory=[{"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 14, "index": 38}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: I now have the red_dye in the crafting slot (0). I will move the red_dye to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_bed
inventory=[{"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 14, "index": 38}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a red_bed, I need to place the red_dye next to a bed in the crafting grid. I will move the red_dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_bed
inventory=[{"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 14, "index": 38}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: I will move the white_bed from slot 22 to slot 2, next to the red_dye.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_bed
inventory=[{"type": "red_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 14, "index": 38}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I have the red_bed in the crafting slot (0). I will move the red_bed to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
